name: ARA
description: Artura is Bitcoin’s fastest perp DEX, designed to capture emerging narratives and unlock billions in untapped BTC liquidity. Built on a synthetic asset model, Artura delivers instant listings, 150x leverage, and low slippage execution while giving traders full custody, no KYC, and no withdrawal limits.
